name: MAINFRAME (SimplyCyclops)
description:
Three Abilities.

Two are available at a time.

One hit and you Lose!

MAINFRAME is an arcade top - down shooter with simplistic graphics made in Unity in 48 hours for the United Game Jam 2020(beginner).

External assets used: 

Radial fill shader by Nrjwolf: https://github.com/Nrjwolf/unity-shader-sprite-radial-fill

8-bit wonder font by Joiro Hatagaya: https://www.dafont.com/8bit-wonder.font

music made with AIVA: https://beta.aiva.ai/

There's a lot that I wanted to add but didn't have time to(most notably UI graphics). I probably will not be updating this game since it's code is an absolute mess, but I might remake it far in the future because I love the concept.
